name: @substrate/smoldot-light
description: Light client that connects to Polkadot and Substrate-based blockchains
author: Parity Technologies <admin@parity.io>

scripts.buildModules: tsc -p tsconfig-mjs.json && tsc -p tsconfig-cjs.json && bash fix-package-type.sh
scripts.prepublishOnly: node prepare.mjs --release && rimraf ./dist && npm run buildModules
scripts.build: node prepare.mjs --release && rimraf ./dist && npm run buildModules
scripts.start: node prepare.mjs --debug && rimraf ./dist && npm run buildModules && node demo/demo.mjs
scripts.test: node prepare.mjs --debug && rimraf ./dist && npm run buildModules && deno run ./dist/mjs/index-deno.js && ava --timeout=2m --concurrency 2 --no-worker-threads
